glsa.title: Boost: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: Two vulnerabilities have been reported in Boost, each one possibly resulting in a Denial of Service.

background.p: Boost is a set of C++ libraries, including the Boost.Regex library to process regular expressions.

description.p: Tavis Ormandy and Will Drewry from the Google Security Team reported a failed assertion in file regex/v4/perl_matcher_non_recursive.hpp (CVE-2008-0171) and a NULL pointer dereference in function get_repeat_type() file basic_regex_creator.hpp (CVE-2008-0172) when processing regular expressions.

impact.p: A remote attacker could provide specially crafted regular expressions to an application using Boost, resulting in a crash.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
